section.p: This template represents patient Goals. A goal is a defined outcome or condition to be achieved in the process of patient care. Goals include patient-defined over-arching goals (e.g., alleviation of health concerns, desired/intended positive outcomes from interventions, longevity, function, symptom management, comfort) and health concern-specific or intervention-specific goals to achieve desired outcomes.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-29584, CONF:1098-29585 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.60"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-29586)/@code="61146-7" Goals (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-29588)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-30719, CONF:1098-30720)
Conforms to Goal Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.121)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-29586)/@code="61146-7" Goals (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-29588)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-30719, CONF:1098-30720)
Conforms to Goal Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.121)
